name: RPGmakerJournal #1
description:
This is #1 in a therapy journal I'm doing in RPG maker VX Ace.

I talk about transgender stuff, Anxiety and dissociation so Trigger warnings for all of those.

Think of this as me putting a note in a bottle and throwing it out into the ocean...But with (hopefully) less pollution.

Theoretically no one will see this but if you are reading this here is a virtual hug and now GET OUTTA HERE lol.
